subject: RE: [junit] If a test fails (on an error), is tearDown called any way?
msgSnippet: ... Unless setUp() fails with any Throwable.... Regards, Rob ... __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Make a great connection at
messageBody:
--- "Di Iorio, Matthew (ISS Atlanta)" <mdiiorio@...> wrote:
> Yes, in my experience, tearDown is always called. From the JUnit
> code:

Unless setUp() fails with any Throwable....

Regards,

Rob
>
> class TestCase {
> ...
> public void runBare() throws Throwable {
> setUp();
> try {
> runTest();
> }
> finally {
> tearDown();
> }
> }
